name: Krista Fincke
text: Always above and beyond to help their customers! Also very knowledgeable.

name: John Seagroves
text: I’ve taken my van to Gulf State since I bout my 2007 Dodge Grand Caravan from them. There’s no one I trust more to work on my van to continue to keep me safe on the road. There first priority is to the customer and making sure there Knowledged before leaving there facility. There work is top notch and have never taken advantage of myself. Shout out to James. He’s always been there for me when I needed to ask a question over the phone. Always been there for me when I was on a jam.

name: Detrect Skinner JR
text: Excellent service and very professional facilities.

name: Ken Gamble
text:
I bought a van from them, years ago, that they redid all the work that another company did to it as far as the lift system goes.
I took it back to them a little while back because the lift was coming out before the doors would open and it shattered my side window one time. They checked it out, did a couple of things and said, okay you're good to go, charged over $400. I got home, it started doing the same thing again. Couple days later I went back up there again, they looked over it, charged over $400 again and said there's nothing we can do with it, even though they redid the lift system and now it's worse than it was before. I don't have money to drive hours away for nothing, they should have told me when we talked the 2nd time they could not do it.

name: Bob Broach
text:
Really great staff i.e office and technicians. Had to reschedule due to medical problems. Staff worked no went out of their way to help me get my lift operating again.
Great improvements  to waiting room and restrooms. Really like the addition of all the Military Flags on the wall of the showroom.

name: Jhonny Kelly
text: Gulf State mobility is a very professiona . And very curious employees and very respectable and also , they employees was helpful and they also explained everything clearly so I can understand about the lifter , they install on truck I will prefer anyone to gulf State mobility for service and quality

name: willie johnson jr
text: Have gotten excellent service and professional expertise from staff. I was referred by  the V  for my mobility needs and am more then satisfied with my product and follow up repairs and service. Thanks for everything!!!

name: Todd Daigle
text: I purchased a vehicle from this place and I've been treated very good since. James(the owner) is very personable and will go above and beyond most place would be willing to help you out. The only thing that's bad about the place is it's and hour and a half from my house, but worth the drive each time I had to go.

name: Thomas Garrett
text: Hands down this is the best place to go if you need something worked on such as wheelchair accessibility list for your vehicle's doors anything you can imagine these guys can do if it has to do with handicap and military because the owner James Garrett is a retired military

name: Bob B.
text: Gulf States Mobility are the best in the business. Excellent work and a great staff.

name: Clint
text: Friendly and courteous staff. All prices upfront,  no hidden costs.

name: Dennis Tomlin
text: Great group of folks. They built 2 of my accessible vans and maintained a third.I have been going there for 17 years. Ask for Tommy!

name: Jobelle Collie
text: i hope you have an entire day to waste.  slow service and poor customer service.
